review: Worked flawlessly right out of the box.  Not as fast as the Fire TV, which we also have, but the Fire TV Stick is much cheaper.  This unit was added to our second TV, and it works fine.
author: Randy S. Kautz

review: A lot of time is spent buffering.  I have actually turned off the tv and watched from my computer to get better reception.  if this continues, I'll return the Stick.
author: Jolie Lindley

review: Easy to set up and use! Excellent viewing, great selection of APPs, movies and music!
author: DaniC

review: Works great! Prefer the firestick over the Chromecast.
author: Stephanie Moss

review: Works well, great picture but disappointed in lack of free media
author: Thomas R. Weekes "Tweekes"

review: A little hard to navigate and there wasn't as many apps as I thought there would be
author: Dominic Albanese
